fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player at night to attack.
- Cleave during the day. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immune.
- If a player attempts to roleblock you, you will attack them and cover their last will in blood, making it unreadable if they die at night.
- Each night, you may choose not to attack roleblockers.
- At the start of odd nights, the host adds a buff to your role.
- {At the start of even nights, the host adds a debuff to your role.}
